author: Ampet092
title: My trip days inn hotel on Broadway
text:
Hotel is located in a great neighborhood very clean. The staff was excelente.
Only thing need to be fix is floor carpet who looks very old on 11th floor.
The train station is on the corner of Broadway.
Duane read pharmacy have all you need.
Mc Donald is just 2 block away.
And Food dinner is open 24/7
Otherwise Hotel is nice.
